invalid_code: Code does not match. Please check again!
invalid_code_number: Code must be a number, Please check again!
invalid_age: User must be at least 13 years old
password_does_not_match: Passwords does not match. Please check again!
user_not_exist: No user exists for the given details!
no_verification_code_available: No Verification code available try again
code_expired_check_new_code: Code is expired, please enter the new code.
start_date_and_time_validation: Please provide start date and time
end_date_and_time_validation: Please provide end date and time
specific_period_validation: Please provide start date time and end date time
invalid_phone_object: Please provide valid phone object, it must be an array of an object must contain two elements { phone_number: number, phone_type: string }
invalid_budget_object: Please provide valid task budget object, it must be an array of an object must contain two elements { start_value: number, end_value: number }, having start_value <= end_value
invalid_service_object: Please provide valid service object, it must be an array of an object must contain following elements { existing_service: [0,1] , service_id: number, service_name: string, estimate_price: number }
invalid_add_type_service_object: Please provide valid service object, it must be an array of an object must contain following elements { category: number , sub_category: number, service_name: string, estimate_price: number }
invalid_file_object: Please provide valid file object, it must be an array of an object must contain two elements { fileName: string, fileMime: string, fileBuffer: object }
